---
title: Community Templates
---

# Community Templates

Rhyolite supports a growing ecosystem of community-contributed templates for plugins and themes.

## Using Community Templates

List available community templates with:

```sh
pnpm exec create-rhyolite --list
```

Use a community template by name:

```sh
pnpm create rhyolite@latest my-plugin -- --plugin community-template-name
```

## Contributing a Template

1. Fork the repo
2. Add your template to `packages/plugin/community/` or `packages/themes/community/`
3. Submit a pull request with a README and example

Your template will be available to all Rhyolite users!
